call.code:
const chipsData = [...state.filterChips]

if (chipsData.some(ary => ary.id == item.id)) {
    chipsData.splice(chipsData.indexOf(item), 1)
    state.setFilterChips(chipsData)
    state.setLoadAddOffers(state.loadAddOffers + 1)
    setFilterSelectionCheck(chipsData)
}

call.code:
let filterChipsArray = [...state.filterChips]
const tabletCount = filterCount?.filterChipCountOnTablet
const desktopCount = filterCount?.filterChipCountOnDesktop

return screen.width > 1600 ? filterChipsArray.slice(0, desktopCount) : filterChipsArray.slice(0, tabletCount)
